changesNotSaved: Changes are not saved until you click Save below.

classes.title: Classes
classes.sub: Upcoming and past classes offered by the center.
classes.createSub: Create a one-time class or a multi-part series.
classes.deleteSub: This permanently deletes the series and all parts.

library.title: Library
library.sub: Books and equipment available at the center
library.createSub: Add a book or piece of equipment to inventory.
library.deleteSub: This permanently deletes the item and all copies.
